main.name: Sebastian Birk
main.description: My passion revolves around Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning and IoT and I love to solve the world's toughest problems with data and AI
main.bio: My initial educational background is in statistics and finance (which I specialized in during my B.Sc in International Business Administration). I have always loved to solve problems with quantitative methods but after completing my first internships for Microsoft and Amazon, I learned about machine learning and it was clear to me that this would play a big role in my professional dedication. I first started to become a Pythonista in my leisure time and completed numerous MOOCs related to data science and machine learning before completing my M.Sc in Business Analytics. Afterwards I began my full-time professional career as Data Scientist at Avanade, which is a joint venture between Microsoft and Accenture. At Avanade I have built various solutions ranging from supply chain simulations to natural language processing and computer vision problems. I am always eager to learn about breakthroughs in machine learning in general and reinforcement learning in particular. I enjoy to read Medium blogs, listen to data-related podcasts and am a big fan of TowardsDataScience.
main.contactmessage: In case you are interested in any of my work or have questions, please feel free to contact me!

education.school: ESADE Business School (#5 QS Business Analytics World University Rankings 2019)
education.description: Focus on machine learning, artificial intelligence, digital business models and cloud platforms. Best graduate of the year (out of 40 Students).
Focus on statistics and quantitative economics. Teaching assistant for 'Explorative Data Analysis'. Best graduate of the year (out of ~300 Students).

projects.title: End-to-End Azure Machine Learning Demo
projects.category: This is a demo that I developed which shows an end-to-end ML deployment workflow. It covers the process from explorative data analysis to productionalized machine learning model.

projects.title: Amazon Sagemaker Accelerators
projects.category: This is a collection of different ML projects that I have implemented using Amazon's Sagemaker.

projects.title: thyssenkrupp alfred Supply Chain Simulation
projects.category: I was technical project lead for the implementation of a supply chain simulation in Azure Databricks for thyssenkrupp. This project is a public success story of Microsoft.

projects.title: Udacity Machine Learning Engineer Nanodegree Capstone
projects.category: This is a project that tackles the Titanic Kaggle Challenge and uses ML explainability algorithms (SHAP) to explain the trained models.

projects.title: Topic Analysis Master Thesis Esade
projects.category: This is my master thesis about 'Topic modeling of microblogging data in tourism.'

projects.title: Creating a PyPi Package Demo
projects.category: This is a tutorial that I created which shows how to create a Python package and upload it to PyPi.

testimonials.text: Sebastian is our personal Andrew Ng.
